Description: Manifest of all modules in the Retold ecosystem

Groups.Name: Fable
Groups.Description: Core ecosystem: service dependency injection, configuration, logging, UUID generation

Modules.Name: fable
Modules.Description: Service dependency injection, configuration, and logging library — the foundation of every Retold application

Modules.Name: fable-serviceproviderbase
Modules.Description: Base classes for Fable services providing registration, dependency injection, and lifecycle management

Modules.Name: fable-settings
Modules.Description: Tolerant configuration chain for loading and merging application settings from multiple sources

Modules.Name: fable-log
Modules.Description: Flexible logging wrapper with six severity levels and extensible output streams

Modules.Name: fable-uuid
Modules.Description: UUID generator supporting RFC 4122 v4 and configurable random strings

Modules.Name: fable-log-logger-bunyan
Modules.Description: Bunyan structured logging provider for Fable-Log

Modules.Name: fable-operationstep
Modules.Description: Simple base class for Fable operation steps

Groups.Name: Meadow
Groups.Description: Data access layer: ORM, query DSL, schema definitions, database connectors, and RESTful endpoint generation

Modules.Name: stricture
Modules.Description: MicroDDL schema definition language generating JSON, SQL DDL, MySQL, MSSQL, and documentation from compact definitions

Modules.Name: foxhound
Modules.Description: Fluent query DSL generating dialect-specific SQL for MySQL, MSSQL, SQLite, and ALASQL

Modules.Name: bibliograph
Modules.Description: Key-value record comprehension service for change tracking in data ingestion pipelines

Modules.Name: bibliograph-storage-leveldb
Modules.Description: LevelDB storage provider for Bibliograph record comprehension

Modules.Name: bibliograph-storage-lmdb
Modules.Description: LMDB storage provider for Bibliograph record comprehension

Modules.Name: bibliograph-storage-rocksdb
Modules.Description: RocksDB storage provider for Bibliograph record comprehension

Modules.Name: meadow
Modules.Description: Provider-agnostic data broker with CRUD operations, audit tracking, and soft deletes

Modules.Name: parime
Modules.Description: Generic data lake behaviors and services for managing large-scale data ingestion

Modules.Name: meadow-endpoints
Modules.Description: Automatic RESTful CRUD endpoint generation from Meadow entities with behavior injection hooks

Modules.Name: meadow-connection-mysql
Modules.Description: MySQL and MariaDB pooled connection provider for Meadow

Modules.Name: meadow-connection-mssql
Modules.Description: Microsoft SQL Server connection provider for Meadow

Modules.Name: meadow-connection-sqlite
Modules.Description: SQLite connection provider for Meadow via better-sqlite3

Modules.Name: meadow-graph-client
Modules.Description: Graph client for pulling sets of records and comprehensions from Meadow endpoints

Modules.Name: retold-data-service
Modules.Description: All-in-one Fable service assembling schema, entity, endpoints, and REST API from a single configuration

Modules.Name: retold-harness
Modules.Description: Pre-built API harness with a bookstore demo for testing and development

Modules.Name: meadow-integration
Modules.Description: Data integration tools for CSV import, schema mapping, and centralized format transformations

Groups.Name: Orator
Groups.Description: API server: unopinionated HTTP server abstraction, static file serving, HTTP proxy, WebSocket support, and reporting

Modules.Name: orator
Modules.Description: Unopinionated HTTP server abstraction with lifecycle hooks, route management, and pluggable service servers

Modules.Name: orator-serviceserver-base
Modules.Description: Base service server class for Orator providing the server abstraction interface

Modules.Name: orator-serviceserver-restify
Modules.Description: Production HTTP server implementation for Orator powered by Restify

Modules.Name: orator-static-server
Modules.Description: Static file serving for Orator with MIME type detection, default file resolution, and subdomain routing

Modules.Name: orator-http-proxy
Modules.Description: HTTP reverse proxy for forwarding requests to backend services through Orator

Modules.Name: tidings
Modules.Description: Extensible reporting system for generating HTML, PDF, and other format reports

Modules.Name: orator-conversion
Modules.Description: File format conversion endpoints for Orator service servers

Groups.Name: Pict
Groups.Description: MVC tools: views, templates, providers, application lifecycle, form builders, editors, grids, and CLI utilities

Modules.Name: pict
Modules.Description: Non-opinionated MVC module with template expression engine — treats UI as rendered text for browser, terminal, or any output

Modules.Name: pict-template
Modules.Description: Template handler base class for extending Pict with custom expression types

Modules.Name: pict-view
Modules.Description: View base class with full lifecycle (initialize, render, solve, marshal), renderables, and CSS injection

Modules.Name: pict-provider
Modules.Description: Data provider base class for fetching, transforming, and delivering data to Pict views

Modules.Name: pict-application
Modules.Description: Application base class coordinating multiple views, shared state, and structured lifecycle management

Modules.Name: pict-panel
Modules.Description: Hot-loadable control panel component for browser applications

Modules.Name: pict-router
Modules.Description: Hash-based URL routing via Navigo with template string route functions for Pict applications

Modules.Name: pict-nonlinearconfig
Modules.Description: Nonlinear configuration manager built on Pict for multi-step, branching configuration workflows

Modules.Name: pict-section-form
Modules.Description: Configuration-driven dynamic forms with 13+ input types, data marshaling, and mathematical solving

Modules.Name: pict-section-recordset
Modules.Description: CRUD record management views built from Meadow endpoint schemas with list, detail, and dashboard views

Modules.Name: pict-section-tuigrid
Modules.Description: Toast UI Grid integration for spreadsheet-like tabular data display with sorting, filtering, and editing

Modules.Name: pict-section-content
Modules.Description: Markdown parsing and content rendering with syntax highlighting, Mermaid diagrams, and KaTeX math equations

Modules.Name: pict-section-code
Modules.Description: Code editor and syntax highlighter wrapping CodeJar with two-way data binding to Pict AppData

Modules.Name: pict-section-markdowneditor
Modules.Description: Segmented markdown editor built on CodeMirror v6 with drag-and-drop reorder, formatting toolbar, image upload hooks, and live rich previews

Modules.Name: pict-section-flow
Modules.Description: Flow diagram section for visual workflow and process representations

Modules.Name: pict-section-objecteditor
Modules.Description: Tree-based JSON object editor section for browsing and editing nested data structures

Modules.Name: pict-section-entitymanagement
Modules.Description: Dynamic entity management sections leveraging pict-section-form metatemplates

Modules.Name: pict-section-formeditor
Modules.Description: Visual form editor for designing pict-section-form configurations

Modules.Name: pict-docuserve
Modules.Description: Single-page documentation viewer built on Pict with catalog navigation, search, and cross-module linking

Modules.Name: pict-chance
Modules.Description: Chance.js random data generation packaged as Pict template functions

Modules.Name: informary
Modules.Description: Dependency-free browser form marshaling with undo/redo history and field-level change deltas

Modules.Name: cryptbrau
Modules.Description: Simple in-browser symmetric encryption for client-side data protection

Modules.Name: pict-service-commandlineutility
Modules.Description: CLI utility module built on Commander for Pict-based command-line tools

Modules.Name: pict-serviceproviderbase
Modules.Description: Base classes for Pict services with pre-initialization support and lifecycle hooks

Modules.Name: pict-terminalui
Modules.Description: Blessed-based terminal interface bridging Pict views to terminal widgets for TUI applications

Groups.Name: Utility
Groups.Description: Build tools, manifest management, documentation generation, process supervision, and caching

Modules.Name: cachetrax
Modules.Description: Hash-indexed object cache with O(1) lookups, time and size based expiration, and custom pruning strategies

Modules.Name: cumulation
Modules.Description: Data synchronization library for managing cumulative state across distributed systems

Modules.Name: indoctrinate
Modules.Description: Documentation scaffolding with content cataloging, label-based filtering, and multi-format output generation

Modules.Name: manyfest
Modules.Description: JSON manifest for consistent data description, validation, and hash-address-based access across application layers

Modules.Name: precedent
Modules.Description: Meta-templating engine with pattern-based start/end markers and word tree matching for code generation

Modules.Name: quackage
Modules.Description: Standardized build tool for browser bundles, transpilation, testing, and packaging via Gulp and Browserify

Modules.Name: ultravisor
Modules.Description: Process supervision with scheduled tasks, distributed nodes, and LLM integration for automated workflows

Modules.Name: pict-cruisecontrol
Modules.Description: Automated and user-assisted web page navigation and data marshaling for browser automation
